submission.balance: I deposited 53,056.36 in USDC. This amounts to 52,379.78 CASH-USDC LP tokens.
submission.messageText:
1. My Eth address on Metamask is : 0xd367Ed9d114c928e5FE73862C03Ff3a90717598a

2. My Solana address is : EN2jchevAyNp3RPam2tccZNM7bCdH8A3anXqbDdUMH12

3. My CASH-USDC LP account is : 7eS3FHPsTCBPEfFvH28eo17dMHm5jv1BfDUxL57vDZat

It is owned by Sunny which is the account I farmed on, the transactions were : 
https://solscan.io/tx/2DMqYQSEJBPVCzvogCdM8tDEN1ZMeN1BMTy4p8VEdZezWgtKinNKayx6MNPk8XLL3tTRZzhnWA5U3oLjxupdcPsB
https://solscan.io/tx/4S6rrw5j9rtHMYUMdGAp7WeXnpD9Q6iWEu6DiNhAvcVRjJztQd6mLXqFyjAcnZJvrjBvufaduWBdy7hPdBur42LH

4. I splited 2% of LP after exploited. The transaction are 
Before 
https://solscan.io/tx/2DMqYQSEJBPVCzvogCdM8tDEN1ZMeN1BMTy4p8VEdZezWgtKinNKayx6MNPk8XLL3tTRZzhnWA5U3oLjxupdcPsB
After
https://solscan.io/tx/2gaHYoBzrzDjcdCjCtHQzFJBpfaem3Lp7c51B2dP8t69ht8CM2ZCrweKF898DpXvLxTnCFML3SyDEKWNjPiMPfgA
https://solscan.io/tx/5dMYWqrotC3XsL1mJtzDqFaFEoHk8qUgeJw5PinAP7Gq8MQaAXRhfaEoK8ZFPDKuEvcpZVPqUnMdPnFAFqbBph1m

5. I deposited 53,056.36 in USDC. This amounts to 52,379.78 CASH-USDC LP tokens.

6. I am Thai people and stay in Thailand. I was an employee in steel factory in Rayong province for almost 20 years. I just quited my job and going to move back to my hometown in Songkhla to stay close to my parents as they are too old. The source of money mainly came from my providend fund along my hard working life in factory. The 52,379.78 USD is very big money for my family in Thailand. I can use this money for their food, health, education more than 5 years. I have 1 kid with 3 years old, today is his birthday, he will go to school in this May and 2nd kid is coming soon. 

I am not a rich people but I always help the Charity in my area such as https://www.camillianrayong.org/, https://www.thepattayaorphanage.org/or/?page_id=2, https://web.facebook.com/mahatai?_rdc=1&_rdr. I do this because it make me happy, even my money is not much but at least I do help.

It is very hard/stress time to me after hacked because I just quit the job and I still didn't get the new job in new area. This money, at first, was plan to be the buffer for my family while I don't have income. That's why I put it in stable coin LP and staked. I just stake it the same day that the pool was hacked.

Please kindly mercy me and my family. Please return 52,379.78 USD of our food/life. That effect too much. My health is not so good now, I'm not sure how can I recover this amount. 

Highly Thanks for your kindness and understanding. Please. /\ /\ /\
